top.title: Iran says it has hit US base in Bahrain, as it launches strikes across region
top.summary: Huge plumes of black smoke were seen rising from an area near the headquarters of the US Navy's Fifth Fleet in Manama, Bahrain.

top.title: Bowen: A dangerous moment, but US and Israel see opportunity not to be missed
top.summary: Israel and the US believe Iran's regime is vulnerable, dealing with an economic crisis and the aftermath of protests.

top.title: Bill Clinton asked about hot tub photo and testifies he knew 'nothing' of Epstein crimes
top.summary: The former president told the committee that he would never have flown on Epstein's plane if he "had any inkling of what he was doing".

top.title: Trump orders government to stop using Anthropic in battle over AI use
top.summary: The move announced on social media comes after a standoff between Anthropic's boss and the US Department of Defense.

top.title: Resident Evil Requiem's director on redefining the survival horror genre
top.summary: Director Koshi Nakanishi says balancing action and horror within the game has been a huge challenge.

top.title: 'I was on Instagram all day' - woman tells landmark trial
top.summary: The young woman, who accuses Meta and Google of making addictive social media platforms, has been speaking in court.

title.#text: A legendary weather app makes a comeback
Tenways nearly perfects the shareable city e-bike
Defense secretary Pete Hegseth designates Anthropic a supply chain risk
